[[File:Minecraft Mobspotter's Encyclopedia Cover.png|thumb|250px|Cover for ''Minecraft: Mobspotter's Encyclopedia'']]
'''''Minecraft: Mobspotter's Encyclopedia''''' is a ''[[Minecraft]]'' book authored by [[Mojang Studios]] and published by Random House World that gives information and commentary on the 79 mobs that existed as of [[Trails & Tales]].

== Synopsis ==
{{quote|You’ll meet seven expert guides, who are full of stories of their fun experiences, and be taken on a tour to explore every corner of the Overworld. You’ll even navigate to the Nether and experience the End dimension, on a thrilling journey to witness all seventy-nine [[mobs]] in existence.<br><br>
Discover how to survive a shoot-out with [[skeleton]]s, dive for treasure with [[dolphin]]s or risk a run-in with the [[Ender Dragon]]—and then start a whole new adventure of your own!}}{{Quote|It’s time for adventure! Discover all there is to know about every mob in Minecraft in the official Mobspotter’s Encyclopedia: The Ultimate Guide to the Mobs of Minecraft.|Product details}}
== Contents ==
[[File:MobsEncyclopedia Pages.jpg|thumb|Table of contents, featuring an [[allay]], [[vex]], and [[strider]]s.]]
Each page provides information and commentary on at least one [[mob]] and features relating to it. The book covers all mobs added until the [[Trails & Tales]] update across seven sections. Each section has a different character original to the book providing commentary on the mobs.

<small>''Numbers shown after each mob represent the page that the mob's information is found on.''</small>
